overview:
Hylke Sprangers is the co-founder and owner of MOUNT HOLLAND. This Amsterdam based company designs and develops smart Internet products and services for anything that happens on the cross point between innovative technology and social communications.

Prior to Mount Holland, Sprangers worked for 9 years at NorthgateArinso, a worldwide leading IT & Outsourcing company, where he held various International executive management positions. As global VP Operations at NorthgateArinso, he was responsible for managing 3,000 employees in 10 global delivery centers across Europe, the Americas and Asia.

Prior to joining NorthgateArinso, he has held various management positions in the IT and Internet industry. At Deloitte Consulting he worked as Sr. Manager e-Business Systems.

As a young laureate cum laude in Computer Science at the VU Free University of Amsterdam, he joined the Center of Mathematics and Computer Science - the national research institute and think tank of technological innovations in The Netherlands.
